item.dc:creator: captain0chris
item.description:
Apollo11Engage:

hi.plz any body do this beauty job and give me one or two or … download link !
my fkn download speed is too low and with STEAM itself its too bad speed and makes me nervous!>
assistance will be greatly appreciated ! thank you all dudes!

I was looking for a torrent to download the source SDK base 2007 and found one that includes Black Mesa too. I already found a fast torrent of black Mesa via GamersHell (yes! GamersHell offer torrent with webseed of their servers downloads!!!) so with the following torrent I selected blackmesa files and chose not to download. (live today 2013 aug 9th it is downloading slowly 50-120kb/s, but i prefer that cause steams bandwidth limit creates huge lags on my brothers cs:go online gameplay [even in very low limits])

https://kickass.to/black-mesa-source-sdk-base-2007-t6666492.html

or the magnet link (copy paste in your address bar and hitting enter should open your torrent client and start downloading metadata)

magnet:?xt=urn:btih:0E12553A6F2D43D15AD4B8AE31989EA21E037F72&dn=black+mesa+source+sdk+base+2007&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.openbittorrent.com%3A80%2Fannounce&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Fopen.demonii.com%3A1337

Posted here because others advanced users may be looking the same alternative to steam download service!

EDIT: Because I refered to GamersHell torrent I will give the main download page of the Black Mesa Free Full Game https://www.gamershell.com/download_93608.shtml under red button “Download” click “Show advanced download options” select fast or/and closest server download, then in the next page, under the “Your download is ready. Please click here to download the file.”, there should be a “Download as torrent (using this mirror to seed)”!!!

item.title: Requesting Source SDK Base 2007 download link !!!
item.dc:creator: Dr_Tub
item.description:
Apollo11Engage:

thank you dear Alx ! whatever , do you know where can i find downloaded data (like SOURCE SDK BASE 2007 or something else…) that the steam server can download it??
i looked yesterday that the steam server start download SOURCE SDK BASE 2007 with 2.879… MB and either BLACK MESA UPDATE for running HL1-BM . so i want to know where it could be in my hard drive??and wanna save it for myself and back it up !
thank you.

Um, slightly confused but I’ll try to help.

Source SDK can be downloaded through Steam by going to the Library tab and finding the Tools Section.

After its downloaded the files themselves are located somewhere in your Steam folder. Its not necessary to back them up yourself.

BMS is installed in your sourcemods folder, which is located in your Steam folder (Normally around C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps). (Or Program Files (x86) on 64bit systems.)

I hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Source SDK Base 2007 download link !!!
item.dc:creator: Alx
item.description:
Inside steam, go to top menu.

Steam > Settings > Downloads + Cloud

Then change Download region to something else. Your region may be under heavy load.

I’d suggest getting it from Steam still, to keep it easy.
